TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AddInStore extends System.Object
public ref class AddInStore abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides methods to store and find information about available add-ins and pipeline segments.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此类以生成、 重新生成，并更新两个缓存文件，如下表中所述。 |缓存文件|创建文件的方法| |----------------|----------------------------------| |PipelineSegments.store

此文件位于管线目录结构的根目录中。|

新的管线段的更新文件。 如果不安装了任何新段，此方法只是验证缓存。



重新生成该文件，并包括新的管道段。| |AddIns.store

此文件位于包含一个或多个外接程序子目录的目录中。 如果此目录位于管线目录结构，它必须命名为外接程序。|

使用新的加载项中指定的位置更新文件。 如果加载项不在管线目录结构，请调用此方法。

如果不安装了任何新的加载项，则此方法只是验证缓存。



重新生成该文件，并包括加载项中指定的位置。 如果加载项不在管线目录结构，请调用此方法。



如果外接程序位于管线目录结构，此方法使用新的外接程序更新文件。



如果外接程序位于管线目录结构，此方法重新生成该文件，并包括新的外接程序。| 如果它们以前不存在，则这些方法创建的缓存文件。 创建缓存文件后，使用方法来检查文件，以查找匹配的外接程序的指定的宿主视图的所有加载项。 此外可以使用方法来查找特定的加载项。 > [!IMPORTANT] > 不支持允许不受信任的用户或实体访问 PipelineSegments.store 和 Addins.store。 这样做可能会导致应用程序出现数据损坏问题。 ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更新缓存文件。 [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#2)]

static member FindAddIn : Type * string * string * string -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

Docs.param: The type that defines the host's view of the add-in.
The path to the root of the pipeline directory structure.
The path and file name of the add-in to find.
The type name of the add-in.
Docs.returns: A collection of tokens that contains only the token representing the add-in that was found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果找到用于外接程序的单一管道，则它将是中的唯一项目<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>集合。 如果找到多个管道来指定外接程序，您可以通过检查来区分它们<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A>属性。
## Examples 下面的示例查找特定的加载项。

Docs.summary: Finds all add-ins for a specified host view of the add-in.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation>枚举当前仅包含<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation.ApplicationBase>值，用于指向主机的应用程序基目录。
## Examples 下面的示例查找加载项中指定的位置在<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation>枚举。
[!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#4)]

is an invalid value.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> FindAddIns (Type hostViewOfAddIn, System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation location, params string[] addInFolderPaths);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> FindAddIns(class System.Type hostViewOfAddIn, valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation location, string[] addInFolderPaths) cil managed
Public Shared Function FindAddIns (hostViewOfAddIn As Type, location As PipelineStoreLocation, ParamArray addInFolderPaths As String()) As Collection(Of AddInToken)

public: static System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<System::AddIn::Hosting::AddInToken ^> ^ FindAddIns(Type ^ hostViewOfAddIn, System::AddIn::Hosting::PipelineStoreLocation location, ... cli::array <System::String ^> ^ addInFolderPaths);
static member FindAddIns : Type * System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation * string[] -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

Docs.param: The type that defines the host's view of the add-in.
One of the enumeration values. Currently the only value in this enumeration is the directory specified by the property that was used to set up the host's application domain.

(Optional). The path of the directory that contains one or more subdirectories of add-ins. Because this parameter takes an array of strings, you can specify more than one path. This parameter is not required if your add-ins are located in the pipeline directory structure under the AddIns folder.
Docs.summary: Finds all add-ins for a specified host view of the add-in at the location specified by a value and an optional add-ins folder.
Docs.returns: A collection of tokens that represent the add-ins that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的重载以启用部分受信任的主机，不能具有路径发现权限来发现其自己的位置，若要在其自己的目录中查找外接程序。

Docs.exception: There is an access violation to the pipeline directory structure.
is an invalid value.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> FindAddIns (Type hostViewOfAddIn, string pipelineRootFolderPath, params string[] addInFolderPaths);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> FindAddIns(class System.Type hostViewOfAddIn, string pipelineRootFolderPath, string[] addInFolderPaths) cil managed
Public Shared Function FindAddIns (hostViewOfAddIn As Type, pipelineRootFolderPath As String, ParamArray addInFolderPaths As String()) As Collection(Of AddInToken)

public: static System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<System::AddIn::Hosting::AddInToken ^> ^ FindAddIns(Type ^ hostViewOfAddIn, System::String ^ pipelineRootFolderPath, ... cli::array <System::String ^> ^ addInFolderPaths);
static member FindAddIns : Type * string * string[] -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

Docs.param: The type that defines the host's view of the add-in.
The path of the root of the pipeline directory structure.

(Optional). The path of the directory that contains one or more subdirectories of add-ins. Because this parameter takes an array of strings, you can specify more than one path. This parameter is not required if your add-ins are located in the pipeline directory structure under the AddIns folder.
Docs.summary: Finds all add-ins for a specified host view of the add-in from a specified root directory.
Docs.returns: A collection of tokens that represent the add-ins that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将检查缓存的外接程序和管道段信息以查找所有加载项的匹配指定的存储区文件`hostAddInView`类型。 然后可以在返回使用某个标记<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>集合来激活特定的加载项通过调用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>方法的<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>类。

Docs.summary: Rebuilds the pipeline segments cache and includes new segments.

Docs.summary: Rebuilds the pipeline segments cache and includes new segments at the location specified by a value.
Docs.returns: A collection of strings that describe warnings as the pipeline segments are evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的重载以启用部分受信任的主机，不能具有发现其自己的位置的权限，以发现加载项在其自己的目录中。

Docs.exception: A segment directory is missing from the pipeline directory structure.
There is an access violation to the pipeline directory structure.
is an invalid value.

## Remarks 如果外接程序管线目录结构中，此方法还重新生成外接程序缓存。
仅当可能与缓存问题，必须重新生成时，才使用此方法。 为了提高性能，使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A>方法。

There is an access violation to the pipeline directory structure.

如果没有任何新的管线段或外接程序，此方法只是验证缓存。
